chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqT_refl: reflexive (Term A n) (eqT (A:=A) (n:=n))
consA: mon n -> list (mon n) -> list (mon n)
nilA: list (mon n)
listA: Set
DescA: list (mon n) -> Prop

Goal:
forall p q : poly, sltP p q -> lex_exp (mon n) ltM (fspoly p) (fspoly q)

Premises:
sltP = fun sa sb : poly => let (p, _) := sa in let (q, _) := sb in ltP p q : poly -> poly -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
lex_exp : forall (A : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop), Pow A leA -> Pow A leA -> Prop
poly = {a : list (Term A n) | canonical a} : Type
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
eqT : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
reflexive : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
fspoly = fun sa : poly => let (p, H) := sa in exist DescA (fP p) (canonical_imp_olist p H) : poly -> Pow (mon n) ltM
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop |- Prop]
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
eqTerm_refl : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, reflexive (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
ltP_sind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp, (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P pO (pX x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT x y -> P (pX x p) (pX y q)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> ltP p q -> P p q -> P (pX x p) (pX y q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), ltP l l0 -> P l l0
ltP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P pO (pX x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT x y -> P (pX x p) (pX y q)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> ltP p q -> P p q -> P (pX x p) (pX y q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), ltP l l0 -> P l l0
eqTerm_trans : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, transitive (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqTerm_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, symmetric (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical (pX a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical (pX b p)
eqT_zerop_is_eqTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b
Inductive ltP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := ltPO : forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), ltP pO (pX x p) | ltP_hd : forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT x y -> ltP (pX x p) (pX y q) | ltP_tl : forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> ltP p q -> ltP (pX x p) (pX y q) Arguments ltP (_ _)%list_scope Arguments ltPO _ _%list_scope Arguments ltP_hd [x y] (_ _)%list_scope Arguments ltP_tl [x y] [p q]%list_scope
plusA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 d : A, eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (plusA a b) (plusA c0 d)
plusA_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b : A, eqA (plusA a b) (plusA b a)
plusA_A0 : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a : A, eqA a (plusA a A0)
zeroP_plusTermr : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
zeroP_plusTerml : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
zeroP_dec : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x : Term A n), {zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x} + {~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) x}
plusA_assoc : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall a b c0 : A, eqA (plusA a (plusA b c0)) (plusA (plusA a b) c0)
divA_is_multA : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0), eqA a (multA (divA a b nZb) b)
moreCoefStructure.divA_A0_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a : A) (nZa : ~ eqA a A0), eqA (divA A0 a nZa) A0
olist_pX_eqT : forall (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), olist (pX a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> olist (pX b p)
plusTerm_comp_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b c)
eqA_ref : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> reflexive A eqA
divA_eqA_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 d : A) (nZb : ~ eqA b A0) (nZd : ~ eqA d A0), eqA a c0 -> eqA b d -> eqA (divA a b nZb) (divA c0 d nZd)
eqTerm_plusTerm_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a c -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) b d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a c) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) b d)
ltP_tl : forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> ltP p q -> ltP (pX x p) (pX y q)
plusTerm_comp_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c a -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) c b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) c a) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) c b)
eqTerm_minusTerm_plusTerm_invTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) b))
eqTerm_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (x y : Term A n), {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) x y}
eqTerm_multTerm_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c d : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c d -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b d)
multTerm_minusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (minusTerm minusA (n:=n) a b) c)
divA_multA_comp_r : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (a b c0 : A) (nZc : ~ eqA c0 A0), eqA (divA (multA a b) c0 nZc) (multA (divA a c0 nZc) b)
eqA_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> symmetric A eqA
eqA_trans : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> transitive A eqA
multTerm_plusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) c)
mult_invTerm_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a) b) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b))
olist = fun p : list (Term A n) => DescA (fP p) : list (Term A n) -> Prop Arguments olist _%list_scope
pX = cons : Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments pX _ _%list_scope
plusTerm_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (x y : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) x y -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) x y) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) y x)

```coq
intros p q H. unfold sltP, lex_exp, fspoly, canonical in *. destruct p as [p Hp]. destruct q as [q Hq].
intros h. specialize (h p q H). destruct h as [h | [h | h]].
- apply ltP_sind.
  + intros x p. apply ltP_tl. apply eqT_refl.
  + intros x y p q Hlt.
    apply ltP_tl. apply eqT_refl. assumption.
  + intros x y p q Heq Hlt IH.
    apply ltP_tl. assumption. apply IH.
    apply ltPO.
- apply os.
- assumption.
```

original: intros p q H. unfold sltP, lex_exp, fspoly, canonical in *. destruct p as [p Hp]. destruct q as [q Hq]. intros h. specialize (h p q H). destruct h as [h | [h | h]]. - apply ltP_sind. + intros x p. apply ltP_tl. apply eqT_refl. + intros x y p q Hlt. apply ltP_tl. apply eqT_refl. auto. + intros x y p q Heq Hlt IH. apply ltP_tl. auto. apply IH. apply ltPO. - apply os. - auto.
